idea-plugin.name: px2remForWebStorm
idea-plugin.description: a tool which can convert px to rem in webstorm
idea-plugin.change-notes:
you can use shortcut key 'shift d' to convert px to rem from a line or a selected text in webstorm. you can also set a proportion at the menu of 'File - Other Settings - PX2REM', which will be used when calculate the rem value. you can find more notes at https://github.com/sunqian1991/WebStorm-PX2REM.


Instructions:

1. find menu at 'File - Other Settings - PX2REM', set a proportion.

2. select a text which contains a 'px' value or move cursor at a line.

3. use default shortcut key 'shift d' to convert px to rem with a line; btw, you can reset the shortcut at 'File - Settings - keymap - Plug-ins - px2remForWebStorm'.

4. use default shortcut key 'ctrl shift d' to convert px to rem with a file.



webstorm插件，主要是把css中的px转换为rem，其中可以在webstorm中设置转化的比例值(File-Other Settings-PX2REM)，目前是自动转换光标所在行内的正确书写的样式，或者转换光标选择的px样式，如果有更好的使用方式建议，欢迎提出，共同学习。


使用说明：

1. File - Settings - plugins - Browse repositories... - 搜索 'px2remforwebstorm' - Install (也可以通过 File-Settings-plugins-install plugin from disk-选择生成的jar文件-restart webstorm 在本地安装)

2. File-Other Settings-PX2REM设置计算的比例值-选中代码段或光标移动到需要转换的行，点击shift+d

3. 设置界面和快捷键设置可以在插件中自定义

4. 也可以使用快捷键'ctrl shift d'来转换整个文件中需要转换的单位
